Here‚Äôs @daschreiber‚Äôs post explaining the logic behind the deal in more detail: https://t.co/DJ9c3QtKAW

+ @Metromile has built an enterprise software business that provides traditional insurers with a modern claims experience. Although still new and small (~$5m ARR), this is something we hoped to get to one day, so we‚Äôre excited to get started early!
We‚Äôre also excited about the opportunities of having both a fixed-fee and pay-per-mile policy available for our customers!

We plan to have a single experience, and a single tech stack. @Metromile‚Äôs per-mile model will run on the @Lemonade_inc platform. But if you‚Äôre a Metromile customer - nothing changes for the foreseeable future! Just continue driving safely and enjoy your Metromile policy.
Over the years @Metromile were able to iterate and perfect their usage based insurance algorithms. They‚Äôre now in the process of deploying their 3rd generation risk prediction and pricing models.
.@Metromile‚Äôs customers report 47% savings on average, while their loss ratio is within 10% of Geico and Progressive‚Äôs direct business.
We‚Äôll incorporate @Metromile‚Äôs precision pricing models into our existing car product to accelerate its path to profitability
The deal will allow us to expand faster - @Metromile is licensed in 49 states, and live in 8, including California
The 380 people strong @Metromile team will join the @Lemonade_Inc team to accelerate the growth of our new car business
.@Metromile‚Äôs comes with more than $100mm of in-force premium, about 100,000 loyal customers, and more than $250m in cash
.@Metromile brings 10 years of closed-loop telematics and machine learning models trained on +3,000,000,000 miles of driving data
We looked at dozens of companies for potential M&A over the years, but none materialized. That is, until we‚Äôve met the @Metromile team
Shortly after launching our own car insurance, we‚Äôre stoked to be adding the @Metromile team to the @lemonade_inc family!
